purpose: Define and operationalize a robustness gate with reproducible promotion decisions.

directives.intent: Establish a graded stress hierarchy for robustness testing.
Set explicit numeric pass/fail criteria for gate enforcement.
Specify metrics and behaviors that must remain stable under perturbation.
Order feature/component removals to measure marginal contribution and failure points.
Catalog factors likely to trigger brittleness or variance blow-ups.
Run controlled transformations with constrained ranges to isolate causal effects.
Define exact conditions required for advancement to production or next stage.
Produce durable, machine-readable decision records with evidence and parameters.
